meanings.definition: A sweet, syrupy liquid used as a solvent and sweetener.
meanings.sent1: The bakery used glycerines to make the frosting sweet and shiny.
meanings.sent2: I added a drop of glycerines to my tea to make it sweeter.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf accidentally spilled glycerines all over the kitchen, making everything sticky.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like glycerines, sweet and soothing to the soul.
meanings.sent5: The sun reflected off the glycerines, creating a rainbow of colors in the room.

meanings.definition: A type of alcohol compound found in fats and oils.
meanings.sent1: Glycerines are essential for the formation of fats in our bodies.
meanings.sent2: The scientist explained how glycerines play a crucial role in the structure of oils.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the bottle of glycerines, causing a slippery mess on the floor.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed smoothly, like glycerines in a chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: The glycerines in the soap helped moisturize and soften the skin.
